trans-unit.source: Represents an element.
trans-unit.target: 代表項目。

trans-unit.source: Elements are one of the most common nodes in the W3C Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 項目是其中一個最常見的節點 W3C 文件物件模型 (DOM) 中。

trans-unit.source: Elements can have attributes associated with them.
trans-unit.target: 項目可以有與其相關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `XmlElement` class has many methods for accessing attributes (<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.GetAttribute%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.SetAttribute%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.RemoveAttribute%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.GetAttributeNode%2A>, and so on).
trans-unit.target: `XmlElement`類別有許多方法來存取屬性 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.GetAttribute%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.SetAttribute%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.RemoveAttribute%2A>，<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.GetAttributeNode%2A>等等)。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.Attributes%2A> property which returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlAttributeCollection> enabling you to access attributes by name or index from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.Attributes%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.Xml.XmlAttributeCollection>讓您從集合中存取屬性的名稱或索引。

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix; see the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.Prefix" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間前置字元；請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.Prefix" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The local name; see the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.LocalName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 本機名稱；請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.LocalName" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI; see the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.NamespaceURI" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間 URI；請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.NamespaceURI" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The parent XML document.
trans-unit.target: 父代 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Do not instantiate an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> directly; instead, use methods such as <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 請勿執行個體化<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>直接; 相反地，使用方法例如<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateElement%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttributeCollection" /> containing the list of attributes for this node.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含這個節點之屬性清單的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttributeCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttributeCollection" /> containing the list of attributes for this node.
trans-unit.target: 包含這個節點之屬性清單的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttributeCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses changes the value of the first attribute.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用第一個屬性值的變更。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; <see langword="false" /> to clone only the node itself (and its attributes if the node is an <see langword="XmlElement" />).
trans-unit.target: 若要在指定的節點下遞迴地複製子樹狀結構，則為 <see langword="true" />；若只要複製節點本身 (如果節點是 <see langword="XmlElement" /> 則還有其屬性)，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a duplicate of this node.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個節點的複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned node.
trans-unit.target: 複製的節點。

trans-unit.source: This method serves as a copy constructor for nodes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可做為節點的複製建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The duplicate node has no parent (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A> returns `null`).
trans-unit.target: 重複的節點有沒有父代 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A>傳回`null`)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new element, clones it, and then adds both elements into an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 下例會建立新的項目、 複製它，並再將這兩個項目加入至 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the attribute value for the specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定屬性的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This is a qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 這是限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: It is matched against the <see langword="Name" /> property of the matching node.
trans-unit.target: 它會與符合節點的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性比對。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value for the attribute with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有指定名稱之屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 指定的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: An empty string is returned if a matching attribute is not found or if the attribute does not have a specified or default value.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到相符的屬性，或屬性不具指定或預設值，則會傳回空白字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks to see if the element has the specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查項目是否具有指定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the attribute to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的屬性的區域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the attribute to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的屬性的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value for the attribute with the specified local name and namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有指定區域名稱和命名空間 URI 之屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 指定的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: An empty string is returned if a matching attribute is not found or if the attribute does not have a specified or default value.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到相符的屬性，或屬性不具指定或預設值，則會傳回空白字串。

trans-unit.source: Return the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This is a qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 這是限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: It is matched against the <see langword="Name" /> property of the matching node.
trans-unit.target: 它會與符合節點的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性比對。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see langword="XmlAttribute" /> with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有指定名稱的 <see langword="XmlAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see langword="XmlAttribute" /> or <see langword="null" /> if a matching attribute was not found.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see langword="XmlAttribute" />；如果找不到相符的屬性，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks to see if the element has the specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查項目是否具有指定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" /> with the specified local name and namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有指定區域名稱和命名空間 URI 的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see langword="XmlAttribute" /> or <see langword="null" /> if a matching attribute was not found.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see langword="XmlAttribute" />；如果找不到相符的屬性，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> containing a list of all descendant elements that match the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" />，其中包含符合指定名稱之所有子代 (Descendant) 項目清單。

trans-unit.source: The name tag to match.
trans-unit.target: 要比對的名稱標記。

trans-unit.source: This is a qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 這是限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: It is matched against the <see langword="Name" /> property of the matching node.
trans-unit.target: 它會與符合節點的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性比對。

trans-unit.source: The asterisk (*) is a special value that matches all tags.
trans-unit.target: 星號 (*) 是與所有標記相符的特殊值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> containing a list of all descendant elements that match the specified <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.Name" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" />，其中包含符合指定 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.Name" /> 之所有子代 (Descendant) 項目的清單。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> containing a list of all matching nodes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" />，包含所有符合節點的清單。

trans-unit.source: The list is empty if there are no matching nodes.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有符合的節點，此清單會是空的。

trans-unit.source: The nodes are placed in the order in which they would be encountered in a preorder traversal of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> tree.
trans-unit.target: 節點都放置在其中發生的 preorder 周遊中的順序<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>樹狀目錄中。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectSingleNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.GetElementsByTagName%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 建議您改用<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectSingleNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，而非<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.GetElementsByTagName%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets and displays all the book titles.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會取得並顯示所有書籍項目。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the file, `2books.xml`, as input.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用該檔案，`2books.xml`作為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The local name to match.
trans-unit.target: 要相符的區域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The asterisk (*) is a special value that matches all tags.
trans-unit.target: 星號 (*) 是與所有標記相符的特殊值。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI to match.
trans-unit.target: 要相符的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> containing a list of all descendant elements that match the specified <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.LocalName" /> and <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.NamespaceURI" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" />，其中包含符合指定之 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.LocalName" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.NamespaceURI" /> 的所有子代元素的清單。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> containing a list of all matching nodes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" />，包含所有符合節點的清單。

trans-unit.source: The list is empty if there are no matching nodes.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有符合的節點，此清單會是空的。

trans-unit.source: The nodes are placed in the order in which they would be encountered in a preorder traversal of the `XmlElement` tree.
trans-unit.target: 節點都放置在其中發生的 preorder 周遊中的順序`XmlElement`樹狀目錄中。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectSingleNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.GetElementsByTagName%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 建議您改用<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectSingleNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，而非<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.GetElementsByTagName%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current node has the specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前的節點是否有指定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute to find.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: This is a qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 這是限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: It is matched against the <see langword="Name" /> property of the matching node.
trans-unit.target: 它會與符合節點的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性比對。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current node has an attribute with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前的節點是否具有指定名稱的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current node has the specified attribute; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前節點有指定的屬性，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks to see if the element has the specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查項目是否具有指定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the attribute to find.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的屬性的區域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the attribute to find.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的屬性的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current node has an attribute with the specified local name and namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前的節點是否有具有指定區域名稱和命名空間 URI 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current node has the specified attribute; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前節點有指定的屬性，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see langword="boolean" /> value indicating whether the current node has any attributes.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="boolean" /> 值，表示目前節點是否有屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current node has attributes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前節點擁有屬性，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是文件物件模型的 Microsoft 擴充功能。

trans-unit.source: The following example removes all attributes from the root element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會移除根項目中的所有屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the concatenated values of the node and all its children.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定節點的串連值和其所有的子節點。

trans-unit.source: The concatenated values of the node and all its children.
trans-unit.target: 節點的串連值和其所有的子節點。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property replaces all the children with the parsed contents of the given string.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性指定字串的已剖析內容取代所有子系。

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是文件物件模型的 Microsoft 擴充功能。

trans-unit.source: The following example compares the `InnerText` and <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerXml%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會比較`InnerText`和<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerXml%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the markup representing just the children of this node.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定表示此節點子系的標記。

trans-unit.source: The markup of the children of this node.
trans-unit.target: 此節點子系的標記。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property replaces the children of the node with the parsed contents of the given string.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性指定字串的已剖析內容取代節點的子系。

trans-unit.source: The parsing is done in the current namespace context.
trans-unit.target: 剖析會在目前命名空間內容中完成。

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是文件物件模型的 Microsoft 擴充功能。

trans-unit.source: The following example compares the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> and `InnerXml` properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會比較<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A>和`InnerXml`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The XML specified when setting this property is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: 未正確設定這個屬性之語式時所指定的 XML。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tag format of the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目的標記格式。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the element is to be serialized in the short tag format "<item/>"; <see langword="false" /> for the long format "<item></item>".
trans-unit.target: 傳回<see langword="true" />如果項目，則以短標記格式序列化，以"<項目 />";<see langword="false" />代表長格式"<項目></項目>"。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, if set to <see langword="true" />, the children of the element are removed and the element is serialized in the short tag format.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時，如果設定為 <see langword="true" />，會移除項目的子系，並且以短標記格式序列化項目。

trans-unit.source: If set to <see langword="false" />, the value of the property is changed (regardless of whether or not the element has content); if the element is empty, it is serialized in the long format.
trans-unit.target: 如果設定為 <see langword="false" />，會變更屬性的值 (不論項目是否有內容)；如果項目是空的，將會以長格式序列化。

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是文件物件模型的 Microsoft 擴充功能。

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension of the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是 Microsoft 擴充功能的文件物件模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds content to an empty element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將內容加入空的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the local name of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前節點的區域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the current node with the prefix removed.
trans-unit.target: 目前節點名稱的前置詞被移除。

trans-unit.source: For example, <see langword="LocalName" /> is book for the element <bk:book>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<see langword="LocalName" />是書籍項目的<bk:book>。

trans-unit.source: If the node does not have a prefix, `LocalName` is the same as <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點沒有前置詞`LocalName`相同<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.Name%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays information on the ISBN element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示資訊的 ISBN 項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the qualified name of the node.
trans-unit.target: 取得節點的限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: The qualified name of the node.
trans-unit.target: 節點的限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: For <see langword="XmlElement" /> nodes, this is the tag name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 對於 <see langword="XmlElement" /> 節點，這是項目的標記名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays information on the ISBN element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示資訊的 ISBN 項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespace URI of this node.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個節點的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of this node.
trans-unit.target: 這個節點的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: If there is no namespace URI, this property returns String.Empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有命名空間 URI，則這個屬性傳回 String.Empty。

trans-unit.source: This is the namespace URI specified at creation time.
trans-unit.target: 這是在建立時指定 URI 的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: For example, `NamespaceURI` is urn:samples for the element \<bk:book xmlns:bk= "urn:samples">
trans-unit.target: 例如，`NamespaceURI`是元素的 urn： 樣本\<bk:book xmlns:bk ="urn： 範例">

trans-unit.source: The following example displays information on the ISBN element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示資訊的 ISBN 項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> immediately following this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得緊接在這個項目之後的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlNode" /> immediately following this element.
trans-unit.target: 緊接在這個項目之後的 <see langword="XmlNode" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: The node type.
trans-unit.target: 節點類型。

trans-unit.source: For <see langword="XmlElement" /> nodes, this value is XmlNodeType.Element.
trans-unit.target: 對於 <see langword="XmlElement" /> 節點，這個值為 XmlNodeType.Element。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> to which this node belongs.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個節點所屬的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlDocument" /> to which this element belongs.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目所屬的 <see langword="XmlDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: When adding nodes to the current node, use the `XmlDocument` returned by the `OwnerDocument` property to create the node.
trans-unit.target: 將節點加入至目前的節點，使用`XmlDocument`傳回`OwnerDocument`建立節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example inserts a new element into an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將新的項目插入至 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent of this node (for nodes that can have parents).
trans-unit.target: 取得這個節點的父代 (對於具有父代的節點而言)。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlNode" /> that is the parent of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 目前節點的父代的 <see langword="XmlNode" />。

trans-unit.source: If a node has just been created and not yet added to the tree, or if it has been removed from the tree, the parent is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果剛剛建立節點而尚未加入至樹狀結構中，或者已經從樹狀結構中移除，則父代為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For all other nodes, the value returned depends on the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType" /> of the node.
trans-unit.target: 對於其他所有節點，傳回的值視節點的 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType" /> 而定。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the possible return values for the <see langword="ParentNode" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述 <see langword="ParentNode" /> 屬性的可能傳回值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace prefix of this node.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個節點的命名空間前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of this node.
trans-unit.target: 這個節點的命名空間前置詞。

trans-unit.source: If there is no prefix, this property returns String.Empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有前置詞，則這個屬性會傳回 String.Empty。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property changes the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.Name%2A> property, which holds the qualified name for an `XmlElement`.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性變更<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.Name%2A>屬性，其中包含的限定的名稱`XmlElement`。

trans-unit.source: However, changing the prefix does not change the namespace URI of the element.
trans-unit.target: 不過，變更前置詞不會變更命名空間 URI 的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays information on the ISBN element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示資訊的 ISBN 項目。

trans-unit.source: This node is read-only
trans-unit.target: 此節點是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The specified prefix contains an invalid character.
trans-unit.target: 指定的前置詞包含無效的字元。

trans-unit.source: The specified prefix is malformed.
trans-unit.target: 指定的前置詞格式不正確。

trans-unit.source: The namespaceURI of this node is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個節點的 namespaceURI 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified prefix is "xml" and the namespaceURI of this node is different from http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace.
trans-unit.target: 指定的前置詞為 "xml"，且此節點的 namespaceURI 與 http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace \(英文\) 的不同。

trans-unit.source: Removes all specified attributes and children of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 移除目前節點的所有指定屬性和子項。

trans-unit.source: Default attributes are not removed.
trans-unit.target: 不會移除預設屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example removes all attributes and child nodes from the root element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會從根項目移除所有的屬性和子節點。

trans-unit.source: Removes all specified attributes from the element.
trans-unit.target: 移除項目中的所有指定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Default attributes are not removed.
trans-unit.target: 不會移除預設屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 Microsoft 擴充功能的文件物件模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: The following example removes all attributes from the root element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會移除根項目中的所有屬性。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定的屬性

trans-unit.source: (If the removed attribute has a default value, it is immediately replaced).
trans-unit.target: (如果移除的屬性具有預設值，則會立即予以取代)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute to remove.This is a qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之屬性的名稱。這是限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: It is matched against the <see langword="Name" /> property of the matching node.
trans-unit.target: 它會與符合節點的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性比對。

trans-unit.source: Removes an attribute by name.
trans-unit.target: 依名稱移除屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the removed attribute is known to have a default value, an attribute immediately appears containing the default value and, if applicable, the corresponding namespace URI, local name, and prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果您移除的屬性是有預設值，屬性會立即顯示為包含預設值和 （適用），對應的命名空間 URI、 區域名稱和前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The following example removes an attribute from an element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會移除項目中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The node is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 節點為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the attribute to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的屬性的區域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the attribute to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的屬性的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: Removes an attribute with the specified local name and namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 移除具有指定區域名稱和命名空間 URI 的屬性

trans-unit.source: (If the removed attribute has a default value, it is immediately replaced).
trans-unit.target: (如果移除的屬性具有預設值，則會立即予以取代)。

trans-unit.source: If the removed attribute is known to have a default value, an attribute immediately appears containing the default value and, if applicable, the corresponding namespace URI, local name, and prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果您移除的屬性是有預設值，屬性會立即顯示為包含預設值和 （適用），對應的命名空間 URI、 區域名稱和前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The following example removes an attribute from an element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會移除項目中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The node is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 節點為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The index of the node to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之節點的索引。

trans-unit.source: The first node has index 0.
trans-unit.target: 第一個節點的索引為 0。

trans-unit.source: Removes the attribute node with the specified index from the element.
trans-unit.target: 從項目中移除具有指定索引的屬性節點

trans-unit.source: (If the removed attribute has a default value, it is immediately replaced).
trans-unit.target: (如果移除的屬性具有預設值，則會立即予以取代)。

trans-unit.source: The attribute node removed or <see langword="null" /> if there is no node at the given index.
trans-unit.target: 移除的屬性節點；如果指定的索引中沒有節點，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 Microsoft 擴充功能的文件物件模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: The following example removes an attribute from an element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會移除項目中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Removes an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 移除 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlAttribute" /> node to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see langword="XmlAttribute" /> 節點。

trans-unit.source: If the removed attribute has a default value, it is immediately replaced.
trans-unit.target: 如果移除的屬性具預設值，會立即被取代。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: The removed <see langword="XmlAttribute" /> or <see langword="null" /> if <paramref name="oldAttr" /> is not an attribute node of the <see langword="XmlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 移除的 <see langword="XmlAttribute" />；如果 <paramref name="oldAttr" /> 不是 <see langword="null" /> 的屬性節點，則為 <see langword="XmlElement" />。

trans-unit.source: This node is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個節點是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" /> specified by the local name and namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 移除區域名稱和命名空間 URI 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" />

trans-unit.source: (If the removed attribute has a default value, it is immediately replaced).
trans-unit.target: (如果移除的屬性具有預設值，則會立即予以取代)。

trans-unit.source: The removed <see langword="XmlAttribute" /> or <see langword="null" /> if the <see langword="XmlElement" /> does not have a matching attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 移除的 <see langword="XmlAttribute" />；如果 <see langword="null" /> 沒有相符的屬性節點，則為 <see langword="XmlElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example removes an attribute from an element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會移除項目中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This node is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個節點是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Gets the post schema validation infoset that has been assigned to this node as a result of schema validation.
trans-unit.target: 取得後結構描述驗證資訊集，在結構描述驗證之後已將其指派給這個節點。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo" /> object containing the post schema validation infoset of this node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo" /> 物件，包含這個節點的後結構描述驗證資訊集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.SchemaInfo%2A> property is set when this node is validated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.SchemaInfo%2A>驗證此節點時，設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute to create or alter.
trans-unit.target: 要建立或變更的屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This is a qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 這是限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the name contains a colon it is parsed into prefix and local name components.
trans-unit.target: 如果名稱包含冒號，將會剖析為前置詞和區域名稱元件。

trans-unit.source: The value to set for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 要為屬性設定的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the attribute with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 設定具有指定名稱之屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: If an attribute with the same name is already present in the element, its value is changed to that of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有相同名稱的屬性已經存在的項目中，其值變更為屬於`value`。

trans-unit.source: `value` is a simple string.
trans-unit.target: `value` 這是簡單的字串。

trans-unit.source: It is not parsed as it is being set.
trans-unit.target: 它不會剖析為正在設定。

trans-unit.source: Any markup, such as syntax to be recognized as an entity reference, is treated as literal text and needs to be properly escaped by the implementation when it is written out. In order to assign an attribute value that contains entity references, the user must create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute> node plus any <xref:System.Xml.XmlText> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlEntityReference> nodes, build the appropriate subtree and use <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.SetAttributeNode%2A> to assign it as the value of an attribute.
trans-unit.target: 任何標記，例如語法能夠辨識當成實體參考，會被視為常值文字，必須正確逸出，實作時，它會寫出。若要指派包含實體參考的屬性值，使用者必須建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute>節點以及任何<xref:System.Xml.XmlText>和<xref:System.Xml.XmlEntityReference>建置適當的子樹狀結構節點，並使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.SetAttributeNode%2A>指派做為屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The specified name contains an invalid character.
trans-unit.target: 指定的名稱包含無效的字元。

trans-unit.source: The node is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 節點為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: The value to set for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 要為屬性設定的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the attribute with the specified local name and namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 設定具有指定區域名稱和命名空間 URI 之屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 加入新的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlAttribute" /> node to add to the attribute collection for this element.
trans-unit.target: 要加入這個項目屬性集合中的 <see langword="XmlAttribute" /> 節點。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 加入指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: If the attribute replaces an existing attribute with the same name, the old <see langword="XmlAttribute" /> is returned; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性取代相同名稱的現有屬性，會傳回舊的 <see langword="XmlAttribute" />；否則會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If an attribute with that name is already present in the element, it is replaced by the new one.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有該名稱的屬性已經存在的項目中，它會取代新。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="newAttr" /> was created from a different document than the one that created this node.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newAttr" /> 由不同於建立這個節點的另一份文件所建立。

trans-unit.source: Or this node is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 或者這個節點是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="newAttr" /> is already an attribute of another <see langword="XmlElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newAttr" /> 已經是其他 <see langword="XmlElement" /> 物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly clone <see langword="XmlAttribute" /> nodes to re-use them in other <see langword="XmlElement" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 您必須明確複製 <see langword="XmlAttribute" /> 節點，以便在其他 <see langword="XmlElement" /> 物件中重複使用這些節點。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 加入指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlAttribute" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的 <see langword="XmlAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: The `XmlAttribute` does not have any children.
trans-unit.target: `XmlAttribute`並沒有任何子系。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute.Value%2A> to assign a text value to the attribute or use <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.AppendChild%2A> (or a similar method) to add children to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute.Value%2A>指派給屬性的文字值，或使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.AppendChild%2A>（或類似的方法） 加入至屬性的子系。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds an attribute to an element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將屬性加入至項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlWriter" /> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: 要儲存的目標 <see langword="XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves all the children of the node to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 將此節點的所有子系儲存到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 Microsoft 擴充功能的文件物件模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the contents of the element to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示項目的內容寫入主控台。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlWriter" /> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: 要儲存的目標 <see langword="XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves the current node to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的節點儲存至指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 Microsoft 擴充功能的文件物件模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds an attribute to an element and then displays the modified element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將屬性加入至項目，然後顯示 已修改的項目。
